Next steps to call the project “complete” (minimum PDF scope)
1. Finish emergency alert feature

+ Adda /emergency endpoint that returns a fake SMS and triggers Twilio (or just logs)
when urgency="panic".

2. Write a concise README with setup, env vars, run commands, and example curl calls.
3. Deployment

+ Deploy to Render/Fly.io/HF Spaces and note the public URL in README.
4. Optional polish

+ Add “apology” mode by passing a flag (node="apology'") to the prompt.

+ Expose language= parameter and set 11m() to respond in that language.
